titleStmt.title: A solution of Doctor Resolutus, his resolutions for kneeling
titleStmt.author: Calderwood, David, 1575-1650.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
A reply to: Lindsay, David. The reasons of a pastors resolution, touching the reverend receiving of the Holy Communion.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
